articles.title: Jake issues stark warning for SA's European adventure: 'We probably don't have the depth' - News24
articles.description: Echoing the fears of many, Jake White doubts South Africa's franchises will possess enough depth to compete on three fronts this season, especially if the Currie Cup is thrown into the mix too.
articles.content:
• Bulls mentor Jake White has cautioned that SA franchises might lack the depth to cope with playing in Europe this season.

articles.title: Liverpool predicted lineup vs Ajax as Reds set to go on the attack after Napoli "horror" - The Mirror
articles.description: Liverpool take on Ajax in the Champions League at Anfield on Tuesday, bidding to get their European campaign belatedly up and running after a nightmare 4-1 defeat to Napoli in their opening fixture

articles.title: What to expect from the rand in the coming months - BusinessTech
articles.description: South Africa’s rand is expected to be beaten around by global markets in the coming months, as inflationary and interest rate pressure from central banks in the US and the European Union continue to dominate global market movements.
